amendment.description: To provide funding for rural education.

action.text: Amendment SA 1568 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1568 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 326.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1568.
Amendment SA 1568 proposed by Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11078-11081, S11086-11088, S11094-11095; text: CR S11078) To provide funding for rural education.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1568 proposed by Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1542.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1568 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 326.
